org.nd4j.jita.handler.impl

Class CudaZeroHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.jita.handler.impl.CudaZeroHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryHandler

    public class CudaZeroHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements MemoryHandler
    This Mover implementation uses following techs: 1. Unified Memory Architecture 2. Zero-Copy Pinned Memory (if available) 3. Pageable memory (if zero-copy pinned memory isn't supported by device)

        objectId -
